snippet: Regulators may have missed red flags for years at Peregrine Financial Group, whose founder, Russell Wassendorf, a prominent futures industry executive, was arrested Friday on charges of making false statements to regulators.
abstract: Regulators may have missed red flags for years at Peregrine Financial Group, whose founder, Russell Wassendorf, a prominent futures industry executive, was arrested Friday on charges of making false statements to regulators.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and PETER LATTMAN

headline.main: At Peregrine Financial, Signs of Trouble Seemingly Missed for Years
headline.print_headline: At Peregrine Financial, Signs of Trouble Seemingly Missed for Years
